mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_uuid_number as jiaoshiUuidNumber ,a.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,a.jiaoshi_address as jiaoshiAddress ,a.jiaoshi_content as jiaoshiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jiaoshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.jiaoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiAddress},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
